text:
Kylie Jenner posted an underwear selfie on Wednesday, showing off her unusually thin waist and toned six-pack. The makeup mogul’s snapshot was immediately called into question, though, by fans who accused her of photoshopping the image.

In the background of the photo, a curtain appears to be warped, right where Jenner’s super slim waistline begins. Right away, commenters started speculating. “I feel like its photoshopped,” one fan wrote. “U do realize no matter how famous u are, u are perfect as long as u are yourself.”

Responding to the rumors, Jenner posted videos on Snapchat showing her wearing the same black Puma underwear as in the photo. “For the photoshop police,” she captioned the videos.

She also tried to explain the warped background. “So, this is like my selfie mirror and my Snapchat mirror,” she said. “So for future, this is a curtain hanging that looks crooked.”

Despite her excuse, some critics aren’t convinced. “Does she really think we’re that dumb?” one commenter wrote. “Lmao never knew curtains looked like that.”

Do you think Kylie’s selfie is photoshopped? Sound off in the comments!
title: Kylie Jenner SLAMS 'Photoshop Police' After People Called Out Her Underwear Selfie
